original_title: 初音ミク マジカルミライ 2021 (Daily Songs)
overview: The 2021 installment in Crypton Future Media's annual "Magical Mirai" concert series, This concert was unique, as the set list varied depending on the day of each performance, resulting in three slightly different set lists for the event.
title: Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2021 (Daily Songs)
